build.buildCommand: npm install && npm run build && mkdir -p Gau/backend/static && cp -r dist/* Gau/backend/static/ && pip install -r Gau/backend/requirements.txt && pip install gunicorn

deploy.startCommand: sh -c 'if [ -d Gau/backend ]; then cd Gau/backend; elif [ -d backend ]; then cd backend; else echo "ERROR: backend directory not found" && ls -la && exit 1; fi && gunicorn --bind 0.0.0.0:${PORT:-5000} --workers 2 --timeout 120 --access-logfile - --error-logfile - app:app'
